title: Trail from champions stay on screen help
body: It's been happening for a few months now but with certain champions like Evelynn and even skins like death sworn zed or Katarina, bits of the champion glow and this glow stays on my screen so eventually my whole screen will become a light pink or blue. Is there anyone else with this problem and if so is there a solution? I can't find one. It doesn't prevent me from seeing the screen but it is really distracting.

replies.body:
Well that's a strange one. Is it localised to League? Like if you alt-tab does it go away or does it remain?

If it goes away with League, then I'd run a client repair, and if that doesn't work, a clean reinstall with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool).

If it doesn't, and honestly probably anyway, I'd recommend first updating your graphics card drivers.

If none of that works, submit a ticket to Player Support and hopefully they'll be able to  help you further: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
